advances down the ground and meets the pitch to hammer a drive but straight to the covers
comes down again and gets a full toss this time that's driven past the jumping silly point fielder, through extra cover
fullish on middle and leg, front-foot defence to silly point
shapes up for a big drive and sends silly point leaping for cover again, fielded at cover
short of a length, drifts down the leg side and Sabbir turns around and helps it on its way to deep fine leg
full, well outside off, goes for an expansive drive and gets beaten
short, nips in, swivels around and pulls it around the corner to deep backward square leg
short of a length, springs back up and knocks it to covers
full on off, pushed out to mid-on
back of a length, outside off, opens the face late for a dab through the gully region
back of a length, not much turn around off, punched off the backfoot
shot. Dares to take on the angle of the left-arm spinner and skips down the track. It's sliding into him and that angle helps him in his bid to launch Maharaj over cow corner
charges down the ground again and this time just quietly pushes it down to long-off for a single
back of a length, not much turn, punched off the backfoot to cover
comes down the track and this time he isn't in so much control. Swipes hard and whips it off the inside part of the bat through midwicket

that is pristine placement. No other way to describe that. Extra cover was in position but he comes down and places it just to the right of the man there. Sweeper runs to his right and manages to prevent the boundary by diving and pushing the ball back
short ball, swivels around with a pull and the ball stops slightly to come on late and go over the bat
length ball outside off, punched with caution to point
full, going down leg, hits the pad off the inside edge. No chance that would have hit leg stump in any case
full toss, heading down leg again and Mahmudullah glances it fine for a four. Fifty for Mahmudullah, first in South Africa
full and outside off and that has been crunched square of the wicket. Leans forward and opens the face enough to play it backward of the point fielder
back of a length, outside off, kept out off the backfoot
length, non-turner outside off, left alone
fuller ball outside off, gets down for a reverse sweep and plays it very fine through the third man region. Neat shot
full on the stumps, defended down the pitch
pitched up on off, eased down to long-on with a straight bat
flat non-turner outside off, glides it away to deep backward point with an open bat face
a bit of spin in towards off, blocked off the backfoot
short of good length, down the leg side, works it around to deep fine leg
short and wide, cracks it hard off the backfoot, goes too hard, in fact, and chops it towards cover
length ball, nips in slightly at pace, punched towards the covers
short of a length, tucked into square leg, not great connection
short ball around off, jumps back and keeps it down
short of good length, jumps up again and this time the ball is slightly wide of him and he ends up poking at it. Gets an inside edge that runs down towards fine leg
picks the length early and gets down for a paddle through fine leg. There is a fielder in the deep, so he'll only get a brace
crashes a drive through covers. Sweeper cover is left unprotected. Too full and too easy outside off, leans into it and makes great connection despite having to reach out for it
full, spinning in, blocked back
comes down the track but there's a lack of flight. May have got an inside edge on to the pad but he was anyway down by a long way
length ball, defended down the pitch
opens up at the sight of width and hammers this with a half-angled bat but straight to covers

that doesn't matter. They still find a wicket. Sabbir shifts back to this short of a length ball. But the delivery kicks off from that length, making the bounce a bit too disconcerting for Sabbir, who fails to get on top of it, and chops it on
short and angled in, drifts down the leg side and left well alone
short of good length, gets on top of it and nudges it around the corner to deep fine leg
back of a length, heads down leg again, left alone again
shortish, stays back and presents a straight bat. The ball nips in after landing to find the inside part of Mehedi's bat
another inside edge into the pads. Back of a length and well outside off this time. Mehedi plays the angle but the ball nips in and hits the back pad which was outside off
follow-on averted. And it's with a slog sweep that they do so. Gets down and heaves it over deep midwicket. Goes a long way back
loopy fuller ball on middle and leg, pushed out to mid-on
full, sliding on leg, defended
reaches out for one that spins away sharply off a length and gets beaten narrowly
slider on leg, blocked down the pitch
short of a length, angled in, tucked to the right of backward square where Faf makes a diving stop
angling in from well outside off, Mehedi is sure of his off stump and lets it go
full on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler

full, just outside off, driven to mid-off who dives to his right and gets his hand to the ball but pushes it away in the process. Elgar it is. He gets up and chases it down but not before the batsmen can complete a comfortable third
shortish, easily pulled away backward of square leg
short of a length, angling in on off, defended down the pitch with the straightest of bats
just back of a length and very wide outside off, reaches out and pats it to backward point
full on middle, worked with the angle to midwicket
full, comes forward and pushes it out to mid-off

and a wicket first ball. And it's in the same manner as the last wicket with the old ball. Chopped on. It wasn't the bounce this time but the line. Morkel bowls it on a length and takes it away from the batsman. Mahmudullah tries to punch away from the body and gets an inside edge on to the stumps
short of a length, tucked to deep backward square leg
short of a length, punched to covers. Misunderstanding on the call for the single. Bavuma does not pick up the ball cleanly. But they may have avoided disaster anyway

is that a run out? Oh, yes! Brilliant fielding does it. Bavuma the man. Fuller ball outside off, Taskin pushes it out to backward point where Bavuma springs across, dives to his left, picks up the ball and great presence of mind from Markram. Makes sure to get around the stumps. Taskin is sent back and can't get anywhere close to the crease as the bails are taken off
stays back to this length ball and works it into the leg side
short of a length, gets on top of the bounce and drops it in front of point
full, angling in, tries to clip it away and gets hit on the pad. Angle suggests would have missed leg
full, outside off, backs away and drives hard to point
short of a length, angling down leg, tries to help it along and makes no contact
full, driven to extra cover

short of a length, angled in, turns around and tucks it fine. Olivier slides, his right knee may have just got jammed into the turf. Manages to push the ball back but crashes into a stationary camera as the momentum carries him over
back of a length, defended
short of a length, outside off, drops it in front of point
sprays one down the leg side and the batsman tries to tuck but can't make contact
short ball, comes on at chest height, Mehedi does well to face it with a straight bat and keep it down

not quite this time. The short stuff from Rabada continues. Mehedi can't get on top of it this time. Tries to counter it with a straight bat again bu this one bounces more, goes beyond the chest and pings the glove on its way to gully
yorker on off, backs away hurriedly and manages to jam the bat down in time to dig it out
that's an audacious shot over the cordon. Short ball, Mustafizur arches back and flat-bats it over the third slip
tries the same shot but this time the ball follows him. As a result, he has to bend his back and then move away. Plays well despite the position he gets into, helps it on its way
same shot. Flat-batted pat down to third man for a single
full, outside off, defended
fuller around off, drilled away off the inside part of the bat
length ball, pitches outside off and turns away slightly, left alone
slider on middle and leg, leaves a big gap between bat and pad and inside-edges it to the front pad
shapes up for a cut and goes too hard, loses shape and misses the ball altogether

in the air and put down at long-on. Shafiul fetches a slog from outside off with hard hands and gets it off the toe end of the bat. The ball goes miles in the air and two fielders converge on it. Morkel's one of them, moving to his left, doesn't judge it too well and ends up falling over as the ball lands in front of him. Didn't get in any good position to take that one. Tough chance, though
short ball, another flat-batted pat after arching back, this time to point
extremely full on off. Backs away and gets the front leg out to smash it. Hits it straight into the hands of extra cover on the bounce. That was hammered
short ball, arches back and sees the bounce and does not bother reaching out for it
fuller ball on the stumps, pushed straight back
backs away to this short ball and bends his back, does not reach out for it
bangs it in and pushes it across the off-stump of Mustafizur who manages to drop it into the off side

all over. Maharaj seals the innings with an outside edge that is taken at first slip. Good, sharp catch by Amla as he moves his hands to his left and takes it without fuss. Loopy, sliding in on middle and off and straightens just enough as Shafiul plants the front foot forward and sticks the bat out
back of a length, spinning in. Turn straight away, tucked with it to deep midwicket
fuller ball outside off, driven away to mid-off
length ball, spinning away, shuffles across and lets it go
pitched up outside off, driven to cover who dives and stops the ball
sliding fuller ball, nudged away to midwicket
full, on middle and leg, defended back
length ball, slid across Elgar who drops it in front of covers for a quick single
fullish on off, defended
slight shape away outside off from a length, left alone
fullish, moves away just a tad late, left alone again
short of a length, drops it to covers off the backfoot for another quick single
full, outside off, pushed down the ground towards mid-off
not much turn outside off, defended off the outside part of the bat
fullish length, slides in, blocked
non-turning fuller ball outside off, defended back off the outside part of the bat
length ball, spins in slightly towards off, Markram shuffles across and lets it be
full and spinning in, front-foot defence past short leg
full, spinning in towards off, Markram is solid in defence as he comes forward
short ball, shapes up for a pull but the ball tails away late to leave him beaten
short ball, comes on straight this time and sits up nicely for Elgar who pulls powerfully through midwicket
length ball, just outside off, stays in the crease and stabs it out into the covers
length on off, punched towards extra cover
short of a length on off, whipped away through midwicket for a single
length ball, lets it do its thing and reaches out for a punch through the covers
shot. Too full outside off, comes down and drives it with fantastic timing through long-on. Gets into a great position and retains it all the way into the followthrough
nudged into the leg side for a single
length, slightly spins away, bends forward and defends into the covers
full, outside off, squeezes it out through the vacant spaces in the covers for one
non-turning length ball outside off, shuffles across and keeps it out on the off side
short of a length, punched off the backfoot to point
slightly back of a length, a bit of late movement away, Elgar solidly punches it into the covers
late movement again, finds the outside edge but there is no slip. Pitches it up and invites him forward. Elgar uses the absence of the cordon to his benefit for a four through third man
sticks his bat out at a wide delivery without moving his feet and makes a late decision to withdraw it
length, punched wide of sweeper cover and calls for two straightaway. Mustafizur moves to his left but fumbles and they come back easily
short of a length, punched crisply off the backfoot through the covers
slightly back of a length, spins in and Markram punches it back. Mehedi gets down to his right but can't entirely stop it
pitched up outside off, driven out to long-off
full, spinning in, defened
non-turning full ball outside off, defended
full, outside off, driven through the vacant spaces in the covers. No sweeper cover in place
good length, spinning in, tucked to midwicket
back of a length, not much movement outside off, opens the face to point
full, outside off, pushed out to mid-off

huge shout for leg before and given. Seemed close and the umpire Oxenford takes his time to give it. Short of good length ball, curves into Elgar late and beats his attempted flick to hit the pad. Height may be an issue here. No inside-edge. The height is perfectly alright. Hitting middle and leg well within the top part of the stumps. Elgar trudges off
back of a length, angled in on off, defended into the pitch
back of a length around off, punched to covers off the backfoot
back of a length, angling in, Amla punches it towards mid-on with a straight bat
length ball, pitches outside leg, turns around and knocks it to midwicket
back of a length on off, punched to mid-off
full and pushed across, holding its line, left alone
length ball, angled across around the fourth or fifth-stump channel, left alone
full, pushed across outside off, driven to point
short ball, swivels around and pulls it front of deep backward square leg for one
short of a length, pushed uppishly off the backfoot, on the bounce to mid-off
fullish, on the pads, flicked to deep backward square leg
back of a length, tucked from off the pads into the leg side
short, a little bit of width, arches back slightly and punches it out to sweeper cover
back of a length ball outside off, punched straight to covers
fullish, stays in the crease and pushes it out to covers
good length and angling away outside off, Amla secures a single down to third man with soft hands
back of a length on off stump, twirled away to deep square leg
shorter and wider, angling away further, Amla does not go after it
Mustafiz rolls his fingers across this short delivery outside off and foils Amla's pull. The ball rolls to the right of midwicket
seam-up, slanting away outside off, steered to point

Mustafiz rolls his fingers across this full ball outside off. Whippy cutter, breaks away, 124ks, Markram chases a biiiiig drive. He did not pick the change-up. The debutant opener ends up snicking a drive behind to Liton
dug in short and angled in on off, fended off
short and wide outside off, Amla cracks it off the back foot past backward point
variable bounce! Back of a length, creeps low, Bavuma goes low with it and keeps it out
short on off, turned to midwicket for a risky single. The fielder fails to throw the stumps down at the non-striker's end
full and angling in on off, driven back to Taskin
just short of a good length and angling in to a punch to the right of mid-on
full and slanting away just a shade outside off, Bavuma dabs to cover
good length and angling across off, Bavuma ignores it in the channel
back of a length and angling away outside off, Bavuma carefully runs it to point
a bit too full and outside off, cutter, square driven on the up to point
Mustafiz straightens his line, blocked down to mid-off
Mustafiz has his hands on his head. He nearly has Bavuma edging behind. Pitched up and moves away outside off - possibly another cutter - beaten on the outside edge as Bavuma chases it with a drive
Amla stands up tall to a short ball outside off and handsomely punches a single to extra cover
shorter and outside off, glided through backward point
back of a length and on a fourth-stump line, forced back to Taskin
Amla rises on top of this short ball outside off and flays it away to the right of the cover-point sweeper
Amla shuffles across off and ignores this full one in the channel
full and on a sixth-stump line outside off, Amla ushers it through to the keeper
good length and on off, tapped to extra cover
full cutter, does not break away much, blocked on off
back of a length on middle, Bavuma bunts it to the left of midwicket and sets off for a single
full and angling across off, dabbed to backward point
back of a length and angling in on middle, worked to short midwicket. Amla calls for two and motors across for the single. Shafiul helps Amla's cause by not gathering the ball cleanly
full offcutter outside off, 123ks, deviates past the prod outside off
Classy strokeplay from Amla. Back of a length and outside off, Amla jumps off the ground, rises on top of the bounce, and punches it through cover-point
too full on off, Amla can't get under it. He squeezes a drive back to the bowler
overpitched and outside off, Amla creams it straight to extra cover
good length and angling in on off, defended to mid-on off the back foot
bouncer, flies over the left shoulder of Amla. Taskin's front foot has strayed
hip-high short ball on off, sticks in the surface, as Amla hauls a pull to deep square leg
short and holds its line outside off, Bavuma rises on top of it and punches it away to the right of backward point. Taskin finishes off the over
gentle half-volley outside off, Bavuma leans into a drive to extra cover. He can't pierce the gap on the off side
Mustafiz rolls his fingers across this full ball that breaks away outside off, left alone
shorter and angling away outside off, Bavuma rides it to backward point, where there's a misfield. Bavuma and Amla decide against a run
good length and holds its line outside off, left alone
dipping full-toss outside off, Bavuma stretches out outside off and carves a drive to the right of backward point. Attempted cutter from Mustafiz
very full and cuts away outside off, no shot
just short of a good length on off, twirled away between square leg and midwicket
full and outside off, ignored
full and much closer to off, Bavuma judges it well and lets it go
short and outside off, Bavuma goes hard on the cut and chops it to backward point
much fuller on a sixth-stump line outside off, Bavuma shoulders arms
back of a length on off, back-foot whip to midwicket
good length and angling away outside off, Amla uses the angle, dabs it with soft hands past gully
Amla ventures across off stump, takes this length ball from off and middle and clips it away to square leg
Amla shuffles across off again, uses the angle of Mustafiz, and runs it down to backward point
slower cutter, starts outside off and swerves away further, no shot
good length and angling in at off, Amla pats it to the off-side gap with soft hands
123.6ks cutter, good length and breaks away outside off, ignored
back of a length and angling into a solid punch to short cover
length ball outside off, Amla uses his wrists and whips it away to the right of mid-on
short of a length and outside off, Amla uses the pace of the bowler now and late-cuts it to the vacant third-man boundary. Deft
pitched up and angling in on off, Amla nurdles a single in front of midwicket and hares across for a single. Good urgency from Bavuma too
really, really full on off stump, Bavuma drives it back to the bowler off the front foot

Mustafiz has Amla nicking behind with a cutter. Breaks his wrists, finds grip, a fullish ball deviates sharply outside off. A crease-bound Amla chases it wide outside off and outside-edges to the right of Liton
pretty full and angling into a front-foot defence to cover
back of a length and slanted in on off, Faf blocks it solidly
full and largely holds its line outside off, ignored
shorter and skidding in on off, Faf defends it from the crease
tight line on off, dabbed away to point with soft hands
back of a length and on top of off, Bavuma stops it in its tracks
good length and angling in line with the stumps, bunted down to mid-on off the front foot

Dropped by Kayes at backward point. Bursts through his hands. Short and wide outside off, Bavuma scythes a cut in the air. The ball flies to the fielder. Kayes looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and hurts his finger. He leaves the field. Talk about adding injury to insult
hip-high short ball outside off, the ball does not come on. Faf swivels back and manufactures his own pace, pulling it away to the right of mid-on. Good way to get off the mark
back of a length and outside off, punched through the line to mid-off. They take on Mushfiq's arm for a single
full and angling in, Bavuma steps forward and defends it as the ball rolls square on the off side
short and outside off, Faf opens the face and slides it to backward point
slower cutter, guided to cover with soft hands
very full and nips back in on middle, Faf jams his bat on a drive and strokes it straight of mid-on
wide of the crease, angling into a back-foot block back to Mustafiz
Mustafiz rolls his fingers across another full ball that curves away outside off, Bavuma does not go after it
good length and angling across the right hander, dabbed to gully with soft hands
just short of a good length on off, firmly punched off the back foot to mid-on
variable bounce. Good length and keeps low on off. Faf stoops low and defends
back of a length and seams back in from outside off, grazes the inside edge and rolls away past the left of leg stump
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to extra cover off the front foot
back of a length and skids back in on off, fended back
full and angling into a solid block to short cover
very full and outside off, Faf opens the face and drives it to extra cover
back of a length and holds its line outside off, no shot
good length on off, Mustafiz rolls his fingers across this, and gets it to cut away outside off, glided to point
follows the cutter with a bouncer angling away outside off, Faf rocks his head out of the way
tucked off the pads to deep square leg for one
full and angling into the pads of Bavuma, who works it to the leg side
short and wide outside off, Faf throws his hands at the ball. He slashes it hard over backward point. No third man to cut it off
back of a length and outside off, punched on the up to extra cover
full and creeps low outside off, Faf goes low and keeps it out
back of a length and outside off, Faf unleashes a jabbing punch and sends the ball away to the left of short cover and to the right of sweeper in the deep. Excellent shot
too straight now, Faf easily turns it to deep midwicket
shortish and outside off, Bavuma punches away from the body and inside-edges it back to Shafiul
flighted full and wide outside off, drives with the wrists to deep cover. Good urgency from Faf. Two it is
tossed-up offbreak, finishes just outside off, dead batted
driven with the turn to the left of short midwicket
short and skids on outside off, Faf camps back and lashes a drive to sweeper cover
tossed up liberally outside off, Bavuma goes for a drive with firm hands and edges it to where slip may have been
floated up outside off, the batsman stretches out and hammers a sweep to the left of deep midwicket. Pinged off the bat to the boundary
full and angling in on off, patted to the left of mid-on
even fuller and outside off, Faf rocks forward and drives through the line to mid-off
shorter and outside off, punched to extra cover. They hare across for the single. Faf's arrival has injected some urgency into the innings
Bavuma rises on top of this short ball outside off and runs it to gully
back of a length and attached with width outside off, crunched to backward point
good length and angling in, blocked to mid-on
slider outside off, no shot
dangled up wide outside off, dragged to deep midwicket with a sweep. Faf keeping the scorecard ticking
floated up outside off again, swept flat and hard to deep midwicket
paddled behind square from outside off
driven with the break to short midwicket
shorter offbreak, Faf sits back and eases it to deep point and that's drinks
back of a length and outside off, Faf punches crisply to the right of extra cover. The fielder dives to his right to intercept the ball
full and angling in on off, wristily whipped to the left of deep midwicket
Faf stands tall to this shortish offering outside off and punches through the line to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, shoots low, Faf sinks low with it and hastily squeezes it to cover
Faf gets right behind the line of this length ball on off and defends to cover
Faf runs down the track, manufactures his own length, a half-volley, and elegantly drives it to the right of short midwicket
flighted outside off, Bavuma employs the reverse-sweep and sends the ball to the vacant third-man boundary. There was no point as well. Good shot selection
shorter and spins in on off, Bavuma drives down the ground for one
flighted outside off and breaks in, defended with the turn to the leg side
flatter and shorter outside off, chopped away to the left of extra cover
skids on outside off, chopped away to the left of deep point.
tossed up on off stump, Bavuma stretches out and dead-bats it
too full and angling into the pads, whipped out to deep square leg
off-stump yorker, dug out

Taskin ventures wide of the crease and angles a full ball outside off. Bavuma presses forward and smashes a drive to the left of the bowler. Taskin stretched his left hand out and finger-tipped it away
banged short and outside off, pulled powerfully to deep midwicket
dug in short and outside off, beats Faf's attempt to hook it away
slower cutter on off, 98ks, Faf reads the change-up and works it to the leg side
tossed up outside off and spins in, Faf ventures a sweep and places it to the right of deep midwicket
shorter and outside off, defended to the off side
pushed through on off, tapped to the left of short midwicket
whisked with the turn to deep square leg
looped up on off, Bavuma drops it to cover-point and hustles across for one
Faf sends the sweep sailing over midwicket. Tossed up and outside off, Faf hits strongly with the break over the leg side. Great bat-swing
dragged down just outside off, Bavuma sweeps a double to fine leg
back of a length on middle, forced to long-on off the back foot
shorter on off, now it's Faf turn to punch a single to long-on
short and wide outside off, cracked to sweeper cover
tossed-up legbreak outside off, chipped back to the bowler
full on the stumps, Faf moves to 49 with a smooth drive to long-on
back of a length and straight in line, Faf turns it to the vacant spaces at square leg and brings up a 55-ball fifty
Bavuma shuffles across off, meets a cutter, and dabs it to point
Bavuma shuffles across off and clips a single through midwicket
back of a length and angling in on off from around the wicket, Faf plays it back to the bowler
Mustafiz breaks his wrists, finds grip, and gets it to snake away outside off. Bavuma lets the cutter go
Another cutter from Mustafiz. It shoots low, foxes Faf, and the keeper two. Faf and Mustafiz exchange wry smiles. Angled in from around the wicket, breaks away viciously, opening up the batsman
dragged down outside off, Bavuma cracks it to deep cover
short and spins away outside off, lashed to cover
tapped with the break to backward point
Faf dances down the track, Sabbir drags it short on middle, hit down the ground
flighted and spins outside off, patted to point
picked off the pads to the left of the leg umpire
full on off, Faf opens the face and runs it through cover-point
patted square through the off side for one. That's the 100th run of the session
banged in short, the Fizz rolled his fingers across it, Faf rides the bounce and controls a pull to long leg
back of a length and angling into a whip to the leg side
overpitched and wide outside off, seam-up ball, Faf leans into a drive and sends it clattering through the covers
shorter and skidding through outside off, Faf chops the ball to cover
shorter and outside off, forced down to long-on
short and spins in on off, punched with the break to wide long-on
seam-up, 95ks, short on middle, whipped to deep midwicket
full on the pads, carrom ball? picked off to deep midwicket
skidding on outside off, jabbed to cover
short and wide outside off, Bavuma steps back and square-cuts it away
slider on off, keeps low, dug out
short and spins away outside off, forced to sweeper cover
shooter in line with the stumps, played back to the bowler
straight ball on middle, punched down to long-on
half-tracker outside off, crashed away to the off-side sweeper again
tossed outside leg, glanced behind square
offbreak, skids in on off, Faf jams his bat down
punched with the break to midwicket
tossed outside off and spins in, worked away to backward square
nudged with the turn behind square again
fuller offbreak, clipped away through square leg
good length on middle, clipped to deep square leg again
speared on the legs, jabbed back to the bowler
length-ball non-turning legbreak, punched back down the ground
full and straight, bunted to short midwicket
full and spins away outside off, driven with the break to the cover boundary. Bavuma reaches his ninth Test fifty
fired on middle, forced back to the bowler
poked into the covers for a risky single. Mahmudullah throws it to the keeper who takes the bails off but Faf is in
whipped with the break to deep square leg
tossed outside off, played back to the bowler
pitches outside leg from around the wicket, down the track and pushed back to the bowler
sliding into the pads, Faf presses forward and turns the ball to short midwicket
short and keeps low on off, shovelled away to long-on
short and wide outside off, Bavuma sizes it up and scythes a square-cut to the left of sweeper cover
pushed through short and outside off, punched on the up to the right of sweeper now
shorter outside off, turns and bounces prodigiously, left alone
driven through the line to long-off
pushed with the break to point
length ball on middle, played back to Sabbir
short legbreak on off, punched off the back foot to long-on
tossed on middle, driven with the break to midwicket
pushed through on the pads, clipped past the right of that fielder
speared short and outside off, crashed to sweeper cover
tossed on the pads, dabbed to the right of short midwicket. They make the single despite a little mix-up between the wickets
pushed through on middle from around the wicket, driven away to wide long-on
Faf dashes down the track, the bowler drags his length back on middle, Faf adjusts and hits it down to long-on
slides on outside off, the outside edge is found as the ball rolls through vacant slip
shortish, keeps low on off, Faf jabs it down to long-on
dangled up outside off, round-arm ball, zips past the outside edge
skidding on outside off, lashed away to deep point
low-arm slider outside off, driven through the line to sweeper cover
tossed up, full and outside off, eased down to long-off
very full and angling in on middle, Faf stretches out and drives it back to the bowler. Shafiul tumbles to his right and half-stops the ball
near yorker, angling in on middle, dug back down the pitch
pitched up and outside off, Bavuma eases into a drive to mid-off
drifting down the leg side, beating the flick
full and straight, Bavuma presses forward and sweetly drives to mid-on
good length on off, driven on the up to cover
tossed up on off, defended back
flat and skids low outside off, jammed to sweeper
round-arm dart outside off, pushed back to the left of the bowler
lobs a full-toss outside off, which is bunted down to long-off
low-arm slider on off, short, Faf stands tall and punches it to the leg side
arm ball into the pads, blocked to the leg side again
back of a length and slanting into middle and leg, turned to the right of short midwicket
full and outside off, Bavuma presses forward and strokes it nicely through the off side
short and outside off, Faf powerfully flat-bats it to extra cover, who parries it to mid-off
full and angling into a front-foot drive to mid-off
back of a length and holds its line just outside off, dabbed to gully
Bavuma moves forward and punches a length ball on the up to mid-off
slides in on off stump, Bavuma presses forward and dabs it to cover with soft hands
shorter and on off, Faf short-arms it to long-on for one
flighted outside off, run away wide of gully with soft hands
skidding into a forward-defensive back to Mominul

Faf has been given out lbw by umpire Chris Gaffaney. He challenges the on-field out decision. Did he thrust his pad outside the line? Round-arm dart, slides in and finishes on middle, Faf stretches forward for a sweep. He does not get any bat on ball. Struck on the front pad. Ultra Edge detects nothing. The tracker shows it would carry onto hit middle. Impact returns umpire's call. Faf falls for a breezy 81
dangled up outside off and turns in, defended
shorter and outside off, jabbed away to cover
full and on middle, Bavuma presses forward and drives to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Bavuma slaps a single to the cover-point sweeper
short and angling away outside off, de Kock jumps off the ground and chops the ball to backward point
De Kock drops this length ball in front of point and scampers across for a single
back of a length and slides in on middle and leg, de Kock punches it well to long-on
shortish and outside off, Bavuma guides it straight to backward point
round-arm dart on off stump, Bavuma stands tall and punches a single to long-on
tossed up and spins in on leg stump, de Kock presses forward and eases it to long-on
speared very full on off, Bavuma jams one back to the bowler

Great anticipation from Liton Das behind the stumps. This is a belting catch down the leg side. Liton is being mobbed by his team-mates. Bavuma pre-meditates a paddle-sweep as this is floated up on middle stump. Liton moves to his left even before Bavuma makes contact with the ball, he sticks his left hand out and tumbles onto the ground. He holds his shape and ensures the ball does not bounce out. Bavuma has been asked to wait, but it's a clean catch
tossed on middle, played back to Mehidy
tossed on off stump, defended back to the bowler
slower offbreak outside off, eased square on the off side
really full on middle, squeezed to midwicket off the inside half
shorter and slides in on off, Andile punches it back to the bowler
slower through the air and drifts in on middle, dead-bat defence from Andile
short and slid in, hit to short midwicket
full and straight, de Kock shuffles across off and paddles it fine of long leg for four

Liton collects the ball down the leg side and swipes the bails off. Third wicket for Mominul. De Kock skips down the track but he is nowhere close to the pitch of the ball. This breaks down the leg side. The keeper, who had initially moved to his right, gloves the ball, and tumbles to his left to disturb the stumps
slides on outside off, beats the outside edge
full and outside off, driven down to long-off
shorter and outside off, Andile ventures deep in the crease, punches to mid-off for his first runs in Test cricket. Lead 400 now
length ball around off, defended back
fullish, outside off, pushed into the off side
pitched up on middle, drives it out to long-off
full outside off, drilled to midwicket
steps down and the bowler drags his length back, Phehlukwayo is forced to defend back
fullish, outside off, defended
loopy fuller ball, angling in towards off, hammered down to long-off
length, spinning in from a flatter trajectory, punched towards long-on
advances down the ground to this fuller ball and drives it out to long-off
flat length ball, spinning in, punched to long-on for one
straightens around off from a back of a length, Maharaj rocks back and cuts to point
presses forward and leans into a drive through the covers. Places it wide of the fielder in the deep and comes back for two
flat length ball, stays back and punches down the ground
length ball, spinning in towards off, punched through the off side
comes down the track and lofts over mid-off. Doesn't manage to entirely get behind it so it goes off the toe end of the bat and doesn't carry all the way. A couple of bounces and over the ropes
advances again and chips this over mid-on. Long-on runs and the ball dies on him
stays back and punches this back of a length ball with the turn to long-on who is slightly wide
another skip down the track, swipes it through midwicket for six
fullish length ball, angled in from wide of the crease, swings late into Tamim who presents a straight bat and defends down the pitch
length ball outside off, Tamim stands tall and defends into the surface
fullish, comes into Tamim who flicks it to midwicket

bowled him! Morkel strikes first over the chase and it's the big wicket of Tamim Iqbal. This is tremendous stuff from Morkel. Comes from really wide of the crease and angles it into Tamim. Tamim keeps his bat well inside expecting it to go with the arm outside off but the ball cuts in to shatter off-stump

huge appeal for a leg before. Not out says the umpire. Du Plessis briefly calls for a conference and they decide against the review. Back of a length, sliding into the left-hander and hits the front pad as it drifts in to beat the attempted flick. Would have comfortably missed leg

another shout for leg before, this time it looks closer and is given. The angle is into him again but Mominul does not bother reviewing. I think that's the right call because it would have been umpire's call if not for hitting leg stump on the full. Movement in the air, comes in sharply and Mominul is not entirely sure of this one and plays all across that one. Bangladesh two down without a run. Does this seem too familiar?
short of a length, angled across, defended
back of a length, pitching outside leg and comes on around middle, defended
short ball and Imrul pulls comfortably off the backfoot. Moves away from him very late but he manages to find the middle of the bat
short of a length, angled across on off, blocked
short, pitching well outside leg, Imrul turns around and lets it go
short ball, kicks up on him significantly. Catches Imrul off guard as he hurriedly jumps up and keeps it out awkwardly on the leg side
leg-sidish, Mushfiqur turns it away into the leg side

Morkel's on fire. Goes right through Mushfiqur. Bangladesh have lost their two most experienced batsmen. Or have they now? Big Morne has overstepped. Is the landing on the line? Seems like he won't get this in his favour. No-ball called. Mushfiqur gets a lifeline. This was a superb delivery. Full, drawing the batsman forward and gets it to move in late to knock off the middle stump
length ball, holds its line outside off, left alone
fullish, on middle and leg, flicked past midwicket
length ball, nips into him towards off, punched into the covers for a single
flicked in the air, nobody at midwicket. Fielded at the deep
length ball, nipping in towards off, cautiously strides out and pushes it into the covers. This is an excellent spell
short ball, pitches outside leg and goes over middle and leg, ducked under
slightly short of a length, pitches around middle and leg and nips away slightly to beat the outside edge
fullish, swings across late. Good, tempting line from Rabada, Imrul lets it be
short of a length on middle and off, punched back from the crease
full, pushed across just enough to give the batsman the option to drive. Imrul leaves it through it holds its line on its way to the keeper
length ball around off, blocked solidly after getting behind the line towards midwicket
short, wide, gets on top of it and cracks it off the backfoot to point where Bavuma makes a brilliant stop diving to his left
fuller ball on off, eases into a drive through the covers and comes back for a brace
short of a length, just outside off, drops it into the covers off the backfoot for a quick single
just short of a length and angling in towards off from wide outside, left alone
length ball on off, Mushfiqur punches to cover off the front foot and yells out a no
fullish length, extremely tight as it angles in towards middle, defended solidly into the off side

dropped Du Plessis puts down Imrul at second slip. Short of a length, moves prodigiously away from the left-hander who reaches pout and finds a healthy outside edge. Comes on at a comfortable height and du Plessis puts down the sitter
short ball again, pulls clumsily and gets an edge, off the bottom part of the bat. Goes over the keeper and down to fine leg
taps it to the right of short extra for a single
short of a length on off, defended to point from the crease
back of a length ball, angled into off, keeps a little low but he jams the bat down and manages to keep it out
short, angled in at the hips, tucked into the vacant fine leg area for one
short of a length, curves in around middle, turns it away to midwicket
back of a length around off, keeps a little low again, Mushfiqur goes down on the back knee as he defends
slashes at a wide delivery outside off and gets an under-edge, misses the stumps comfortably
fullish on off, punched crisply to short cover who dives and gets a hand to it before mid-off runs in and tidies up
full on off, pushed down the ground and mid-off gets down to his right
length, holding its line outside off this time, good leave from Mushfiqur
full, pushed across and drifts away outside off, not bothered with
short of a length, pitches outside leg and comes on around off, bends forward and punches towards mid-off
full, outside off, driven easily down the ground past long-off. Doesn't try to hit it hard, just eases it away
short ball, pushed across but well within his firing line, arches back and drops his wrists to get away
short ball, pitches outside leg, Imrul can't get on top of it and fails to keep it down, gets a glove that goes backward of short leg
short of a length, keeps low on leg, Mushfiqur turns it away to the leg side
short ball, comes into him, comfortably rocks back despite the pace - 145ks - and pulls over backward square leg
full, pitches well outside off and nips away slightly, left alone
back of a length, comes in slightly, defended off the inside part of the bat back to the bowler
short ball, goes down the leg side, Imrul bends slightly and lets the ball go to the keeper
short ball, jumps up and keeps it down around the backward square leg area
short ball, makes a hurried attempt at a pull. Nowhere near his reach and the ball breezes over him
length, outside off, punched past the cover fielder diving to his left. Sweeper is unprotected and it goes for four. Just good presentation of the face and a slight step forward
kicks up from a short of a length and Mushfiqur is caught off guard but keeps it down well off the top part of the bat even as the back hand comes off the handle
full, turned away to midwicket
short, going over middle and leg, gets under it
short of a length, angled in at middle and off, defended down the pitch with the full face of the bat
full, angling in at leg, tucked away to deep backward square for one
full and holds its line outside off from wide of the crease, ignored in the channel
half-volley outside off - rare error from Morne - Kayes lunges forward and creams a drive through extra cover. Lovely flow of the arms through the line
banged in short on middle, fended off to cover off the back foot
short ball, pitches outside leg and comes on at waist height, pulled away to deep backward square leg

brute of a short ball to end the over. Comes in at searing pace and awkward height around middle. Pushes Mushfiqur back and he could very well have gloved it

that's a lovely delivery. Superb bowling from Maharaj. Finds the outside edge of Imrul with a length ball outside off. Imrul pokes and makes a late decision to keep the bat inside. The decision has come too late as the ball spins in slightly to find the outside edge
flighted on off, non-turning ball, defended off the front foot
tossed up higher and drifts in on off, Mahmudullah hits over the top off his second ball. He hacks it away straight of mid-on
tossed on off stump, not much turn again, Mahmudullah defends to silly point with soft hands

back of a length and angling into the body, clipped away to the right of the man under the helmet. Rabada's front foot has strayed
Rabada finds extra bounce and smacks Mushfiq on the glove. Kicks up from a back of a length on off and catches the Bangladesh captain in a tangle as he looks to fend it away to the leg side
back of a length and wider outside off, run away to backward point

Mushfiq has been bounced out. Amla completes a sharp catch over his head at first slip. A lot of love between Faf and Amla in the cordon. Back of a length and bursts off the deck outside off, Mushfiq spars at it away from the body. The ball grazes the outside edge near the higher part of the bat and flies through to Amla. Great grab from him
short and slanted in on top of off, fended to the off side
Radabda revvs up and bangs a bouncer on leg stump, the batsman hastily ducks under it

drifts in and turns away outside off, prodded away to the left of silly point now
slower through the air, angled in on off stump, blocked back to Maharaj

floated up on off stump, Mahmudullah bends forward in defence. No runs off the bat for 20 balls, including the no-ball
dug in short on off, 136.1ks, Liton defends off the back foot

short and zipping through the channel outside off, Liton quietly tucks his bat inside the line. Mushfiq chased a similar ball and nicked off
Rabada hits the pitch hard and hurls a bouncer on middle, forcing Liton to duck under again

pushed through outside off, dabbed to point off the back foot
Mahmudullah advances down the track, nearly yorks himself, and jams a double through midwicket. First runs off the bat after 28 balls

drift in the air for Maharaj. A crease-bound Mahmudullah looks to drive on the up. An inside edge sneaks away to the left of leg stump

straying into the pads, tucked in the air to the right of Markram at short leg
dug in short on off, Mahmudullah hops and fends it off to cover

Rabada strikes for the second time in three overs. Mahmudullah chops on for the second time in two innings. His middle stump is tiled back. Back of a length and speared outside off, Mahmudullah is caught in two minds: whether to punch it through cover or leave it. He eventually hangs his bat out and drags it back onto the stumps. Bangladesh five down for 62
overpitched and outside off, Sabbir opens the face and drives it square through point for a boundary
full on middle, tapped to the right of mid-on
length ball, drifts in, and breaks away sharply past the outside edge. Excellent delivery
tossed up straight on middle, played back to the bowler

shorter and wider outside off, square-cut away to backward point
lobbed up on off stump, dead-batted
full and on a fifth-stump line outside off, ignored
full and angled in on middle, blocked from the crease to the leg side

Liton pads up to an inswinger, and he has been given out lbw. He calls for a review but this looks quite adjacent. Full and curves back in sharply to ping into the front pad as Liton offers no shot. It would have carried onto hit the leg stump. The tracker returns three reds. Liton has to go. Rabada has struck for the third time in four overs
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, blocked to the covers
bouncer, angled in at the head, the batsman hurriedly ducks under it
floated up on off, blocked off the front foot
Maharaj wins an lbw verdict from umpire Chris Gaffaney. That's plumb. Pushed through full and straight, Sabbir does not connect with a sweep and is hit on the back thigh in line with off and middle

keeps his bat inside the line to a length ball that spins in from well outside off and beats the edge

slightly back of a length, stays back and tries to flick it. Plays all across the line as it pitches outside off and spins in sharply to hit him in front of middle and leg. Seems highly unlikely that it would miss the stumps but Taskin opts for a review.Replays confirm it would have hit leg stump on the full
full, outside off, pushes forward and the ball finds the outside edge to run down to third man

length ball, angling in on off, punches it straight back and the bowler fails to gather it cleanly. Oh, and there's a run out. A needless one at that. The fielder runs back from mid-off and flicks it back. And the batsmen in the meantime decide they want to come back for a third. The throw is fired at the keeper's end and the bails are off before the batsman can be anywhere close to the stumps

that's been slogged out of here. In the swinging arc of Mehidy who gets down on one knee and carts it over cow corner
goes for the same shot again and gets a top-edge this time. He is slightly tucked up. Drops in no man's land around the deep midwicket region

Mustafiz chips a return catch. Maharaj sews up SA's 333-run victory. Lobbed up outside off and breaks back in from the rough, Mustafiz drives weakly and scoops it to the right of the bowler. Good overhead grab from Maharaj. Soft, soft dismissal. Soft, soft innings from Bangladesh
